lines.text: There's gotta be something else in that big spellbook that could do it...
Like an expedited transmission vortex incantation! That's gotta be it!
Or- wait, no. They couldn't do that. Maybe like, a classlock bypass soul ansible?
That- that made even less sense.
Hold on- no, that's- it's gotta be... Zaxro's Reply to the fourthwise Golden Powwow...
If I can figure out how they expatriated the signature of the sorceror's geolocation bond, that'd do it...
C'mon, Whydah, it's magic 101. You just need to think in four and a half dimensions.
